examples: She views this quite differently from me
I consider her to be shallow
I don't see the situation quite as negatively as you do

definitions.text: take into consideration for exemplifying purposes
show consideration for; take into account
examples: The judge considered the offender's youth and was lenient
They considered the possibility of a strike
Turn the proposal over in your mind

definitions.text: judge or regard; look upon; judge
examples: I think he is very smart
I believe her to be very smart
I think that he is her boyfriend
The racist conceives such people to be inferior

definitions.text: regard or treat with consideration, respect, and esteem
